data.message: How do I contact Facebook, it is urgent, someone is using my photos for wrong reasons, even though my profile is privet they are getting my pictures and I'm worried they might get photos of my daughters!!!!

replies.message: Please get back to me ASAP I feel very uncomfortable with what this person has done! It is disgusting I need you all to see what they sent my sister please!

Hey, Nancy. If someone is downloading your photos, altering them, and re-posting them on Facebook, please let us know and we will take them down. Follow these steps to report the photo: http://bit.ly/2ebiDNY. -Rhea

Facebook Facebook Hello Help Desk, This is now my 3rd account with Facebook. My previous  accounts where stolen from me. The most recent being just this past week. I want my last account back. I have too much there to lose it. I am an American man living in the Philippines. I can scan and send a copy of my US Passport and my Philippine drivers' license. Can you please help me to recover my account because who ever did this to me has set my account for deletion so this matter is time sensitive. I'd appreciate a prompt response. Thank you very much!
Do I need to personal message what he sent?
